resources.string:
Next feature release:
 · New: Archived or disabled caches stroken trough in titles
 · New: Offline routing in our maps (you need the 'BRouter' app on your device)
 · New: Support ignoring caches on OpenCaching sites
 · New: Function to remove duplicate caches from all other lists
 · New: Undo ability for clear log menu item
 · New: Filter for found caches missing a voting
 · New: Korean translation
 · New: Cache history now also fetches all caches with saved offline log wich are not saved
 · New: Use cache type icon in header bar of logging screen
 · Fix: Better clipboard format when copying waypoint coordinates
 · Fix: Wrong icon when navigating to a waypoint
 · Fix: Detect wherigo cartridge links in short description
 · Fix: Don't store a signature only log when going back
 · Fix: Make URLs in hints clickable
 · Fix: Add to favorite was not available when logging webcam caches
 · Fix: Store from map no longer stores to default list
 · Fix: Correctly recognize OpenCaching.FR/.IT/.ES URLs
 · Fix: Connect with the new Opencache.uk
 · Change: Fetch more caches from OC sites when GC is disabled in settings
 · Removed: No longer supports captchas for getting exact coordinates as basic member
